channel.title: Nudity on Space·Time Will Tell
channel.description: Recent content in Nudity on Space·Time Will Tell

item.title: Space·Time Deck: The Suit of Scissors (or Blades)
item.description: After the Suit of Paper and the Suit of Rock, here comes the Suit of Scissor (or perhaps Blades – name to be finalized). Warning Museum-level nudity. Scissors/blade traditionally symbolize: forced change; violence; destiny; death. The cards: Ruler Dragon Treasure Soldier Builder Seeker Lover Servant Home Foot (blank, customizable) Teddy bear (blank, customizable) Note that the blue borders are not part of the cards.

item.title: Space·Time Deck: The Suit of Rock
item.description: After the Suit of Paper, here comes the Suit of Rock. Warning Museum-level nudity. Rock traditionally symbolizes: stability; reliability; power. The cards: Ruler Dragon Treasure Soldier Builder Seeker Lover Servant Home Foot (blank, customizable) Teddy bear (blank, customizable) Note that the blue borders are not part of the cards. They are just there to delimit the safe-to-draw zone.
